titleStmt.title: A short forme of thankesgiving to God, for staying the contagious sickenes of the plague: to be used in common prayer, on Sundayes, Wednesdayes and Fridayes / Set forth by authoritie.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 165β); royal arms t.p. verso; initials; preface tail-piece; black letter.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.
